body.p: This document provides instructions to use the MDHT Java API's for creating and parsing CDA based documents. An EMR (Electronic Medical Record) system or a EHRS (Electronic Health Record System) stores the patient and related healthcare information in a proprietary format. In order to create translate the information from a standard document like the CDA (Clinical Document Architecture), a deep knowledge of the internal details of the standards are a pre-requisite. MDHT Java API's can help bridge the gap in this transformation to from a standard CDA based document.
